title: What is the best choice after completing higher secondary education as a good student? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends upon your interests and aim of life. But you will surely require a guide or mentor who will be guiding you in the right manner how to accomplish your dreams in the right manner. My brother was confused in the same manner as yours, but after getting in touch with Sneha Mam , his issues were over and he is very happily pursuing his studies and also does lots of internships as per mam’s suggestions.
